name: Bellibolt
flavorText: When this Pokémon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.

previous.name: Tadbulb
previous.flavorText: Tadbulb shakes its tail to generate electricity. If it senses danger, it will make its head blink on and off to alert its allies.

next.name: Wattrel
next.flavorText: When its wings catch the wind, the bones within produce electricity. This Pokémon dives into the ocean, catching prey by electrocuting them.
